p: Due to the beneficial effects of Se for human and animal health this element has been proposed as a valuable resource for including in functional feeds for aquaculture which can promote health and growth of fish as well as improving the quality of their respective fillets for human consumption. When supplementing feed with Se, an important consideration is which form of Se to use [ 16, 17] Supplementation of feed with organic Se can potentially produce fish with higher concentrations of Se for humans to consume.
